alert.note: Alert for Cochise (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 1:33PM MST until August 07 at 2:30PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tucson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Cochise County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 230 PM MST. * At 131 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located 13 miles southeast of Bowie, or 18 miles west of Steins, moving southeast at 10 mph. This core of this storm was mainly south of Interstate 10. HAZARD...Two inch hail, 60 mph wind gusts and brief heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly remote areas of northeastern Cochise County. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move immediately to shelter inside a strong building. Stay away from windows.
